title: This Nespresso Starter Pack (Complete With 30 Pods) Is Just $100
text:

For those among us who have been thinking about surrendering to the convenience of a single-serve coffee maker — where all you have to do to get some coffee is drop in a pod and press a button — without forgoing taste, the Nespresso Vertuo is an excellent place to start. It’s able to make full cups of coffee and extra-long shots of espresso, in addition to the traditional single shot. (Plus, for those worried about single-use waste, Nespresso pods are made from aluminum and can be easily recycled.) And today is a particularly excellent day to get into the Nespresso game, because you can get this Vertuo machine and 30 pods for just $100 on Amazon. That’s less than what it would cost you to buy just the machine. And even if you’re perfectly content with your existing coffee setup, just know that a Nespresso machine makes a great gift for parents.
